metadata.description: Trapped behind bars for an accidental murder she didn't mean to commit, Anna Williams has been accused of witchcraft. And in Salem, Massachusetts the price for being a witch is Death. But there is hope. Braden Cole has come to the town of Salem to find the man -- or monster -- he has been hunting, Darius. And Braden soon learns that Darius has plans for Anna that are far worse than burning at the stake.
metadata.name: Salem's Daughter, Vol. 1
